timeline.message:
init a project
create and test a QueryTokenService

rename the package name to 'queryfixer'

add documents for classes

decompose the PR into multiple parts.
This is the first part: init the project and implement one feature of the QueryTokenProcessor

timeline.author: kikkyo

timeline.bodyText: Since we only need this once, you can use @BeforeClass?
timeline.author: kikkyo

replies.bodyText: I think @Before is better because I need it to init a member variable. @BeforeClass is a static method and cannot init a member variable.
replies.author: mingen-pan
